sentences.sentence: The paper introduces an well supported method, for predicting/classifying graph nodes.The suggested approaches are easy to understand and lead to a CNN oriented training structure that can make good use of current GPU enhancements.
The thorough assessment in the study includes a comparison of the method with well known benchmarks using extensive real world datasets.
Although I may not have an, in depth knowledge of methods discussed in the literature since predicting links and nodes has been a long standing issue there could be similar strategies out there.
Nonetheless I consider the suggested approach to be straightforward and well supported by empirical evidence.

documents.result_message: Our detector is highly confident that the text is written entirely by a human.
documents.inputText:
The paper introduces an well supported method, for predicting/classifying graph nodes.The suggested approaches are easy to understand and lead to a CNN oriented training structure that can make good use of current GPU enhancements. 
The thorough assessment in the study includes a comparison of the method with well known benchmarks using extensive real world datasets. Although I may not have an, in depth knowledge of methods discussed in the literature since predicting links and nodes has been a long standing issue there could be similar strategies out there. Nonetheless I consider the suggested approach to be straightforward and well supported by empirical evidence.
